profile.name: Lakrak
profile.title: Hunter of the Hand Cannon Lakrak
profile.story: This eccentric albino Goblin enjoys developing powerful weapons more than anything else. Having been harassed and ostracized by other Goblins due to his skin color, he feels no compassion toward his kind. He would gladly shoot, blow up, and smash even a fellow Goblin to test his weapons. However, he also expresses his gratitude to those who help him, and this is how he became Roi's friend. Unfortunately, he is terrible at remembering faces, so he often tries to shoot Roi before he recalls who he is.

1.name: Rapid Fire
1.description:
Deals [ffc800]739*(0.7+(0.3*Skill Level*Awakening Coefficient))+355.4% ATK[-] Physical DMG to enemies in a frontal straight-line area and stuns them for [64ffff]1sec[-]. Non-hero enemies take additional [ffc800]339*(0.7+(0.3*Skill Level*Awakening Coefficient))+185.4% ATK[-] Physical DMG.

[fa96fa][Experiment Success!]:[-] This skill does not trigger a cooldown.

[ffc800]Awakening Coefficient([-]★1 ~ 5[ffc800]): [[-] 1 / 2 / 3.5 / 5.5 / 8 [ffc800]][-]

2.name: Smoke Bomb
2.description:
Deals [ffc800]443*(0.7+(0.3*Skill Level*Awakening Coefficient))+213.5% ATK[-] Physical DMG to the target and nearby enemies, inflicting [fa96fa][Explosive Substance][-] for [64ffff]7sec[-], increasing Physical DMG taken by [ff6464]20%[-] and inflicting [fa96fa]Blind[-] for [64ffff]1sec[-].

[fa96fa][Experiment Success!]:[-] Removes beneficial effects from enemies within the area.

[ffc800]Awakening Coefficient([-]★1 ~ 5[ffc800]): [[-] 1 / 2 / 3.5 / 5.5 / 8 [ffc800]][-]

3.name: Glue Bomb
3.description:
Attaches a sticky bomb to a random enemy.
After [64ffff]3sec[-], the bomb explodes, dealing [ffc800]1500*(0.7+(0.3*Skill Level*Awakening Coefficient))+755.2% ATK[-] Physical DMG to the target and nearby enemies, and stunning them for [64ffff]1sec[-]. Enemies afflicted with [fa96fa][Explosive Substance][-] take additional [ffc800]1001*(0.7+(0.3*Skill Level*Awakening Coefficient))+477.5% ATK[-] Physical DMG.

[fa96fa][Experiment Success!]:[-] The bomb explodes immediately upon attachment.

[ffc800]Awakening Coefficient([-]★1 ~ 5[ffc800]): [[-] 1 / 2 / 3.5 / 5.5 / 8 [ffc800]][-]

4.name: Load Cannon
4.description:
When performing a Normal Attack, has a [64ffff]15%[-] chance to fire a shell, dealing [ffc800]345*(0.7+(0.3*Skill Level*Awakening Coefficient))+166.3% ATK[-] Physical DMG to the target and nearby enemies, and stunning them for [64ffff]1sec[-].
Each time a skill ends, attempts [fa96fa][Experiment][-] with a [64ffff]{4}%[-] chance to succeed, enhancing the next skill. Enhanced skills do not attempt [fa96fa][Experiment][-].

[ffc800]Awakening Coefficient([-]★1 ~ 5[ffc800]): [[-] 1 / 2 / 3.5 / 5.5 / 8 [ffc800]][-]

2.IV: Deals DMG and Stuns the enemy for 1 sec.

dark.effect: Increases the duration of Blind by 1 sec.

light.effect: Mana cost increases by 2000, and the number of bomb placements is changed to 2.

dark.effect: Changes the target to the enemy with the highest ATK.

light.effect: Shell activation chance increases by 25%, and stun duration increases by 0.5 sec.

dark.effect: On [Experiment] success, increases Attack Speed by 12% and Status Ailment Accuracy by 150 for 10 sec.

uw.name: Lakrak MK-1
uw.description:
[Experiment] success chance is increased by {0}%.
On [Experiment] success, Attack increases by {1}%, Attack Speed by {2}%, and damage dealt to non-hero enemies by {3}%. This effect stacks up to 3 times and cannot be dispelled.
uw.story: The destructive yet artistic magnum opus of a quirky Goblin inventor. This single-hand cannon packs the maximum amount of firepower a single Goblin can physically handle. Despite the dangerous amount of gunpowder used, this weapon has fortunately not blown up yet.

1.name: Goblincraft Special High-Density Gunpowder
1.description: [Rapid Fire] Increases DMG by 50%, and recovers {0} Mana upon a Critical Hit.
1.story:
Gunpowder made with Lakrak's dangerous secret recipe. 
Lakrak believed that simple explosions weren't effective enough in terms of battle strategy, so he added some formic acid and stinging nettle poison to add a stunning effect. 
It requires an extremely accurate filtering process, and he uses it in secret to avoid abuse.

2.name: Special Gas Mask
2.description: [Smoke Bomb] Reduces Cooldown by 30% and increases the duration of Blind by {0} sec.
2.story:
A high-performing mask that was made with special materials that Lakrak obtained from around the Orbis Continent. 
This mask is made from Harpy's first feather, a dragon's scales, a leaf from the World Tree, and the empire's mithril, which are all hard to find. 
This mask protects one from poisonous gas as well as the blinding effect of Smoke Bombs.

3.name: Cudgel Bullet
3.description: [Glue Bomb] Increases DMG by 50% and reduces the Heal Rate of the hit target by {0}% for 7 sec.
3.story:
A self-defense bullet with lower killing power.
This bullet, whose design is based on Lakrak's knowledge in precise explosive engineering, is used to cause knock-back when using Rapid Fire. To minimize unnecessary killing, he makes it a point to label all his explosives.

4.name: Bada Boom Cannonball
4.description: [Load Cannon] Reduces Mana of hit enemies by {0}. The first strike in a battle will activate [Load Cannon].
4.story:
A cannon shell Lakrak made in collaboration with Miruru Pirates.
After overcoming many hardships, Miruru Pirates and Lakrak joined hands and worked together for this monster of a weapon.
The special Miruru gunpowder added a significant amount of destructive power to Lakrak's cannonball.
